00020 
00021 #include "JackSystemDeps.h"
00022 #include "JackRestartThreadedDriver.h"
00023 #include "JackException.h"
00024 
00025 namespace Jack
00026 {
00027 
00028 bool JackRestartThreadedDriver::Execute()
00029 {
00030     try {
00031         // Keep running even in case of error
00032         while (fThread.GetStatus() == JackThread::kRunning) {
00033             Process();
00034         }
00035         return false;
00036     } catch (JackNetException& e) {
00037         e.PrintMessage();
00038         jack_log("Driver is restarted");
00039         fThread.DropSelfRealTime();
00040         // Thread in kIniting status again...
00041         fThread.SetStatus(JackThread::kIniting);
00042         if (Init()) {
00043             // Thread in kRunning status again...
00044             fThread.SetStatus(JackThread::kRunning);
00045             return true;
00046         } else {
00047             return false;
00048         }
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 } // end of namespace
